fallbackBehavior.description: The match status to assign to the web request if the request doesn't have a valid IP address in the specified position. Valid values include: `MATCH` or `NO_MATCH`.

headerName.description: The name of the HTTP header to use for the IP address.

position.description: The position in the header to search for the IP address. Valid values include: `FIRST`, `LAST`, or `ANY`. If `ANY` is specified and the header contains more than 10 IP addresses, AWS WAFv2 inspects the last 10.
